variations.template: <compleated_mana> can be paid with <compleated_options> or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
rts: {B/P} can be paid with {B} or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
{U/P} can be paid with {U} or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
{G/U/P} can be paid with {G}, {U}, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
{G/W/P} can be paid with {G}, {W}, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
{R/G/P} can be paid with {R}, {G}, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
{R/W/P} can be paid with {R}, {W}, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.

variations.template: {G/P} can be paid with {G} or 2 life. For each {G/P} paid with life, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
rts: {G/P} can be paid with {G} or 2 life. For each {G/P} paid with life, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.
